subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After Sal Maglie joined the Dodgers, he and Carl Furillo reconciled, though their battles were graver than those of Joba Chamberlain and Kevin Youkilis, now a Yankee.
snippet: After Sal Maglie joined the Dodgers, he and Carl Furillo reconciled, though their battles were graver than those of Joba Chamberlain and Kevin Youkilis, now a Yankee.
